name: Notion Bundle

features: Life OS Dashboard($149) -The most aesthetic way to manage your entire life; Habit Tracker Hub($60) -Your personal accountability partner to build habits that stick; Freelancer VA($60) -Manage clients, projects, and workflows with ease in one place; Goal OS($39)- An Identity-Based Goal System that transforms who you ARE, not just what you DO; Finance OS($39) -Take control of your budget and simplify your finances; Creator Hub($30) -Organize your content creation process from idea to published; Student OS Dashboard($20) -Stay on top of assignments, exams, and personal goals as a student; Mission Control($19)- A single command centre to organize all your projects & tasks; GTD System($10) -Stay organized with the popular "Getting Things Done" methodology; Second Brain($10) -A lightweight system for capturing and organizing ideas
